function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate randomisation in randomised studies leading to biased results.","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of the effectiveness of interventions.","Mitigation":"Improve randomisation methods and allocation concealment, and ensure blinding where possible.","Technologies":"Improved randomisation tools and software.","People":"Researchers, study participants.","Owner":"Research institutions, ethics committees."},{"Description":"Presence of potential confounders in non-randomised studies affecting the accuracy of results.","Impact":"Risk of drawing incorrect conclusions about the association between exposure and outcome.","Mitigation":"Thorough assessment of potential confounders, use of appropriate scales for evaluation.","Technologies":"Statistical software for identifying and adjusting for confounders.","People":"Researchers, data analysts.","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams."},{"Description":"Inconsistent data extraction and aggregation leading to unreliable pooled estimates.","Impact":"Misleading interpretation of the overall effect of interventions.","Mitigation":"Standardised data extraction process, clear criteria for aggregation, and assessment of heterogeneity.","Technologies":"Data extraction software, statistical software for assessing heterogeneity.","People":"Authors, data analysts.","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams."}]}
